name: Ludum Network Support
description:
Keep the networks alive!

Play as a network tech on the field and repair switches/help with their home connection

Had a lot more ideas, but ran out of time:

- wanted to put in cars to avoid!
- wanted to have more of a job list and you choose where to go
- wanted separate accounts/units in the apartment to manage
- had a ui idea that i scrapped and kept everything on screen
